description: Single-cell RNA-seq downstream analysis pipeline that performs preprocessing (normalization, HVG selection, PCA), Leiden clustering, UMAP visualization, differential expression gene (DEG) analysis, and volcano plot visualization from an h5ad input file using Scanpy.
name: sc-leiden-umap

parameters.deg_groupby: Column to group cells by for DEG analysis
parameters.deg_method: Statistical method for DEG testing (wilcoxon, t-test, logreg)
parameters.deg_n_genes: Number of top DEGs per cluster
parameters.n_neighbors: Number of neighbors for neighborhood graph
parameters.n_top_genes: Number of highly variable genes to select
parameters.volcano_logfc_threshold: Log2 fold change threshold for volcano plot
parameters.volcano_pval_threshold: Adjusted p-value threshold for volcano plot
parameters.volcano_top_n_label: Number of top genes to label on volcano plot
